scripts.build: pnpm --filter {{sdkName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{cliName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{docsName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{blogName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{webName}} run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter {{blogName}} run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter {{docsName}} run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter {{webName}} run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter {{sdkName}} run build && pnpm --filter {{sdkName}} run lint && pnpm --filter {{cliName}} run lint
